oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Oklahoma Roundup Rehearsal - 1946-11-18 - KOMA - Part 1
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Rehearsal from the Oklahoma Roundup radio program on November 18, 1946 on radio station KOMA (Oklahoma City, Okla). Staff includes Hiram Higsby (master of ceremonies, writer), Allan Page (announcer, director), and Kenyon Brown (producer).
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Chuck Davis; Roundup Boys; Homegrown Trio; Hiram Higsby; Mary Lou; Dick Reinhart
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: (0:00) Opening statements and theme / (1:30) Hiram Higsby tells a joke and opens the show / (Chuck Davis and the Roundup Boys performs "Way Down in Iowa, I'm Going to Hide Away" / (3:28) Hiram Higsby tells a joke / (4:18) Homegrown Trio performs "Ridin’" / (6:15) Hiram Higsby and Allan Page tell a joke / (6:48) Hiram Higsby performs "The Pants That Pappy Gave To Me" / (8:23) Hiram Higsby and Allan Page tell a joke / (9:15) Mary Lou performs "I’d Love To Hear My Sweetheart Yodel" [unconfirmed] / (11:15) Hiram Higsby and Allan Page tell a joke / (12:12) Dick Reinhart performs "Little Toy Pistol Cowboy" / (14:13) Hiram Higsby and Lem Hawkins tell a joke [incomplete]
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Oklahoma Roundup; KOMA (Radio station : Oklahoma City, Okla.); CBS Inc.; Davis, Chuck; Higsby, Hiram, 1909-1975; Reinhart, Dick;
